title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.13 - Slipping hazards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.13 - Slipping hazards

State Regulations

The owner of a machine shall not suffer or permit any floor
surface open to occupation or traversal by employees or other persons to be
polished or coated with a slippery substance or to be otherwise in a slippery
condition. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
43.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
